original_title: DDT Ryōgoku Peter Pan 2018: Fall Pro-Wrestling Cultural Festival
overview: Ryōgoku Peter Pan 2018: Fall Pro-Wrestling Cultural Festival was a professional wrestling event promoted by DDT Pro-Wrestling (DDT). The event took place on October 21, 2018, in Tokyo at the Ryōgoku Kokugikan. The event, named after the traditional Japanese cultural festival, aired on Fighting TV Samurai and was the first Peter Pan event to be held in fall.
title: DDT Ryōgoku Peter Pan 2018: Fall Pro-Wrestling Cultural Festival
